attr.title: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove
attr.desc: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove loader. Run, jump, and battle as Shovel Knight, wielder of the Shovel Blade, in a quest for his lost beloved. Take down the nefarious knights of the Order of No Quarter and confront their menacing leader, The Enchantress. This is the full and complete edition including all campaigns and features, like Plague Knight, Specter Knight, and King Knight on adventures of their own.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Shovel Knight Treasure Trove for Linux copied to the ports/shovelknight/gamedata folder.
